site_title: Hearty Hug Me by Francis Ow

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an origami heart with arm to hug you. This model is call the Hearty Hug Me designed by Francis Ow. It is perfect to send a heart warming hug to anyone on St-Valentines Day. It is a bit long but I hop you enjoy it. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.body:
